gw.datatype.handler

Interface IMoneyConstraintsHandler

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IDataTypeConstraintsHandler, IDecimalConstraintsHandler, INumberConstraintsHandler
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CurrencyAmountConstraintsHandlerBase

    public interface IMoneyConstraintsHandler
extends IDecimalConstraintsHandler
    Marker interface for constraints that apply to money. Ideally, we'd have a separate type for "money" amounts, rather than the generic BigDecimal. Since we don't, we can distinguish between "money" data types and other decimal data types with this interface.
    Author:
    pdalbora

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Currency getCurrency(java.lang.Object ctx, IPropertyInfo property)
      Gets the currency associated with this money value.

      • Methods inherited from interface gw.datatype.handler.IDecimalConstraintsHandler

        getPrecision, getRange, getScale

      • Methods inherited from interface gw.datatype.handler.IDataTypeConstraintsHandler

        getConsistencyCheckerPredicates, getLoaderValidationPredicates, validateUserInput, validateValue

    • Method Detail

      • getCurrency

        Currency getCurrency(java.lang.Object ctx,
                     IPropertyInfo property)
        Gets the currency associated with this money value.
        Parameters:
        ctx - the object that owns the property to which the value corresponds. May be null.
        property - the property to which the value corresponds. May be null.
